key: Currently for the Tourist account，switching accounts may result in account loss，still have to switch?
zh_cn: 当前为游客账号，切换账号可能导致账号丢失，依然要切换吗？

key: Congratulations! You Has been successfully upgraded to an official account!
zh_cn: 恭喜你！已经成功升级为正式账号!

zh_cn: 抱歉，该设备暂时无法使用快速游戏功能，请注册后登陆。
